question: Who is the author of the book "So You Want to Know About the Environment"?
explanation: The book \"So You Want to Know About the Environment\" has been authored by Bijal Vachharajani. The book will make children analyze, explore, love and respect the environment. It looks at climate change, food, waste, water and wildlife; explains scientific concepts and asks important questions. It is packed with facts, jokes, activities and stories from people working in the field in different parts of the world.
